definition[0]: someone who is owned by another person and works for them for no money
note[0]: the slave trade (=the buying and selling of slaves, especially Africans who were taken to America)
definition[1]: to work very hard with little time to rest
note[1]: slave (away) over a hot stove (=cook – used humorously)
example[0]: I’ve been slaving away at this report.
example[1]: He’s been slaving over his history essay.
